Lyric:
[00:09.450]I know, I know it's been a while

[00:21.910]You know I had it rough, trying to forget you but
[00:28.280]The more that I look around, the more I realize
[00:34.300]You're all i'm looking for
[00:37.340]
[00:38.700]What makes you so beautiful, is you don't know how beautiful you are to me
